game.name: Easter Egg Mania
game.description: If you like Match 3 games, you will love Easter Egg Mania. Match eggs of the same color and score as many points as possible. If you clear all the glass eggs, your timebar will be refilled. Can you enter the top 10 score?
game.metaTitle: Easter Egg Mania, Puzzle Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Easter Egg Mania at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Easter Egg Mania Game, Action Games, Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: MATCH 3 EGGS OF SAME COLOR TO COLLECT THE POINTS
game.webControlKeys: MATCH 3 EGGS OF SAME COLOR TO COLLECT THE POINTS BY L CLICK OF MOUSE
